thread.title: Al Jefferson scores 17 as Hornets rout Clippers 113-71 in 2nd preseason game in China
thread.title_full: Al Jefferson scores 17 as Hornets rout Clippers 113-71 in 2nd preseason game in China

title: Al Jefferson scores 17 as Hornets rout Clippers 113-71 in 2nd preseason game in China
text:
Al Jefferson scores 17 as Hornets rout Clippers 113-71 in 2nd preseason game in China By JUSTIN BERGMAN Associated Press   10:54   10:54   
People: 
SHANGHAI — Al Jefferson scored 17 points and Nicolas Batum added 14 with 10 rebounds to lead the Charlotte Hornets over the Los Angeles Clippers 113-71 Wednesday in the second preseason NBA game between the teams in China. 
The Hornets went on a 36-8 run after halftime and took a 36-point lead with 8:26 remaining. 
Charlotte also won the first game between the teams in the southern Chinese city of Shenzhen on Sunday and improved to 4-0 in the preseason. The Clippers fell to 1-3. 
Clippers point guard Chris Paul played with two fingers taped together on his non-shooting left hand after fracturing his index finger during a scrimmage on Saturday. 
Paul still led the Clippers with 17 points, while Blake Griffin added 14 points and 14 rebounds.
